NAME

maj3 − Compute the majority of 3 inputs

SYNOPSIS

loadrt maj3 [count=N|names=name1[,name2...]]

FUNCTIONS

maj3.N

PINS

maj3.N.in1 bit in
maj3.N.in2 bit in
maj3.N.in3 bit in
maj3.N.out bit out

PARAMETERS

maj3.N.invert bit rw

LICENSE

GPL
